lead_paragraph: Two days after being jettisoned by the Memphis Grizzlies, Dave Joerger has landed in Sacramento as the latest coach looking to end the Kings' decade-long playoff drought.

headline.print_headline: Kings Hire Coach Dave Joerger 2 Days After Firing in Memphis
headline.main: Kings Hire Coach Dave Joerger 2 Days After Firing in Memphis

snippet: Two days after being jettisoned by the Memphis Grizzlies, Dave Joerger has landed in Sacramento as the latest coach looking to end the Kings' decade-long playoff drought....
